public static MaplePacket getHandshake(short majorVersion,
                                       short minorVersion,
                                       byte[] sendIv,
                                       byte[] recvIv)
Gets the basic introduction packet to send to new clients.

Parameters:
majorVersion - the major version number
minorVersion - the minor version number
sendIv - the initialization vector for sent packets
recvIv - the initialization vector for received packets
Returns:
the basic introduction packet to send to new clients
